page.title: 15LIFESTYLES continued
page.content: have mental & spelling tests until playtime at 10.30. Playtime lasts until 10.45. After play we have English until 12.00, when we have dinner & playtime until 1.15. Then its time to go for our swimming lessons at Barnard Castle which takes about 15 minutes . When we get there we get changed & sit around the side of the bath, then Mrs White tells us to do our six widths. We line up in our groups & Mrs White says 'no. 1'& no. 1 goes,then no. 2 and so on. We get back from swimming at 2.45. Our last lesson is finishing off where you finish off anything you haven't done during the week. On a Friday night I go to Bishop Auckland Gym Club. I do gymnastics and tumbling with Mr Smith. On the way home we stop to get fish & chips. I like Fridays because there's no school fot two days.
